title: FLAC - Paul McCartney - Memory Almost Full (remaster)
description:
If you&#039;re browsing this torrent, probably are you already a huge Beatles&#039; or McCartney fan. There is no need to tell you how awful this record, McCartney&#039;s latest, sounds.

This minimal remastering, done by me (I&#039;m a professionnal sound engineer), is a tentative of restoring all the "sonic details" lost during the audio destruction (read : compression) process.

Even though I can&#039;t do no miracles (double negation !), this is the best I could achieve out of those permanently destroyed tapes. I also reduced the volume output in order not to compress even the most minimal peak created during the dynamic range restoration. Back in the 60&#039;s, records were that loud. Why would they be louder today ?

Hope you&#039;ll enjoy it as much as I... and by the way, this torrent is also available in high quality MP3 for those without a FLAC player !

Chris
